languages.text: "Вольный Торговец {name} фон Валанциус, согласно распоряжению к приказу 64-98/ДФ, вынесенному Адептус Администратум и Адептус Арбитес, вам вменяется вина в бесчисленных ересях против священной десятины и благополучия протектората. Формулировки зафиксированы, свидетельства преступлений представлены к рассмотрению, заседание будет объявлено как только вы со своими подельниками будете представлены на месте обвиняемых..." {n}Префект смотрит прямо на вас взглядом змеи.{/n} "Вас ждет суд, {name}".

"Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, in accordance with the amendment to Decree 64-98/DF issued by the Adeptus Administratum and the Adeptus Arbites, you stand accused of countless heresies against the sacred tithe and the well-being of the protectorate. All related statements have been formulated and the evidence of your crimes registered — the proceedings will commence as soon as you and your accomplices present yourselves as the accused..." {n}The prefect looks at you with the eyes of a snake.{/n} "A trial awaits you, {name}."
languages.original_text: "Вольный Торговец {name} фон Валанциус, согласно распоряжению к приказу 64-98/ДФ, вынесенному Адептус Администратум и Адептус Арбитес, вам вменяется вина в бесчисленных ересях против священной десятины и благополучия протектората. Формулировки зафиксированы, свидетельства преступлений представлены к рассмотрению, заседание будет объявлено как только вы со своими подельниками будете представлены на месте обвиняемых..." {n}Префект смотрит прямо на вас взглядом змеи.{/n} "Вас ждет суд, {name}".

All related statements have been formulated and evidence of your crimes registered — the proceedings will commence as soon as you and your accomplices present yourselves as the accused..." {n}The prefect looks at you with the eyes of a snake.{/n} "A trial awaits you, {name}."

"Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, in accordance with the amendment to Decree 64-98/DF issued by the Adeptus Administratum and the Adeptus Arbites, you stand accused of countless heresies that threaten the sacred tithe and the well-being of the protectorate. All related statements have been formulated and evidence of your crimes registered — the proceedings will commence as soon as you and your accomplices present yourselves as the accused..." {n}The prefect looks at you with the eyes of a snake.{/n} "A trial awaits you, {name}."

"Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, in accordance with the amendment to Decree 64-98/DF issued by the Adeptus Administratum and the Adeptus Arbites, you stand accused of countless heresies against the sacred tithe and the well-being of the protectorate. All related statements have been formulated and evidence of your crimes registered — the proceedings will commence as soon as you and your accomplices present yourselves as the accused..." {n}The prefect looks at you with the eyes of a snake.{/n} "A trial awaits you, {name}."

languages.text: {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin} {name} von Valancius, gemäß dem vom Adeptus Administratum und dem Adeptus Arbites erlassenen Zusatz zu Dekret 64-98/DF werdet Ihr diverser Ketzereien gegen den heiligen Zehnt und das Wohlergehen des Protektorats bezichtigt. Alle relevanten Aussagen wurden aufgenommen und die Beweise für Eure Verbrechen registriert ... das Verfahren wird fortgesetzt, sobald Ihr und Eure Komplizen Euch als die Angeklag..." {n}Die Präfektin funkelt dich mit den Augen einer Schlange an.{/n} "Euch erwartet ein Prozess, {name}."
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, in accordance with the amendment to Decree 64-98/DF issued by the Adeptus Administratum and the Adeptus Arbites, you stand accused of countless heresies against the sacred tithe and the well-being of the protectorate. All related statements have been formulated and the evidence of your crimes registered — the proceedings will commence as soon as you and your accomplices present yourselves as the accused..." {n}The prefect looks at you with the eyes of a snake.{/n} "A trial awaits you, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin} {name} von Valancius, gemäß dem vom Adeptus Administratum und dem Adeptus Arbites erlassenen Zusatz zu Dekret 64-98/DF werdet Ihr diverser Ketzereien gegen den heiligen Zehnt und das Wohlergehen des Protektorats bezichtigt. Alle relevanten Aussagen wurden aufgenommen und die Beweise für Eure Verbrechen registriert ... das Verfahren wird fortgesetzt, sobald Ihr und Eure Komplizen Euch als die Angeklag..." {n}Die Präfektin funkelt dich mit den Augen einer Schlange an.{/n} "Euch erwartet ein Prozess, {name}."

languages.text: « {mf|Libre-marchand|Libre-marchande} {name} von Valancius, conformément à l'amendement du décret 64-98/DF promulgué par l'Adeptus Administratum et l'Adeptus Arbites, vous êtes {mf|accusé|accusée} d'innombrables hérésies contre la dîme sacrée et le bien-être du protectorat. Toutes les déclarations relatives à vos crimes ont déjà été formulées et enregistrées, de même que les preuves de votre culpabilité. Les procédures judiciaires commenceront dès que vous et vos complices comparaîtrez devant le tribunal... » {n}Le regard que la préfète vous lance vous rappelle celui d'une vipère.{/n} « Un procès vous attend, {name}. »
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, in accordance with the amendment to Decree 64-98/DF issued by the Adeptus Administratum and the Adeptus Arbites, you stand accused of countless heresies against the sacred tithe and the well-being of the protectorate. All related statements have been formulated and the evidence of your crimes registered — the proceedings will commence as soon as you and your accomplices present yourselves as the accused..." {n}The prefect looks at you with the eyes of a snake.{/n} "A trial awaits you, {name}."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Libre-marchand|Libre-marchande} {name} von Valancius, conformément à l'amendement du décret 64-98/DF promulgué par l'Adeptus Administratum et l'Adeptus Arbites, vous êtes {mf|accusé|accusée} d'innombrables hérésies contre la dîme sacrée et le bien-être du protectorat. Toutes les déclarations relatives à vos crimes ont déjà été formulées et enregistrées, de même que les preuves de votre culpabilité. Les procédures judiciaires commenceront dès que vous et vos complices comparaîtrez devant le tribunal... » {n}Le regard que la préfète vous lance vous rappelle celui d'une vipère.{/n} « Un procès vous attend, {name}. »

languages.text: “行商浪人{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯，根据帝国内政部与帝国法务部颁布的64-98/DF号法令修正案，你被指控犯下了无数异端恶行。你的所作所为，对神圣什一税与王朝的福祉构成了严重威胁。所有相关供词都已记录在案，你的犯罪证据也已登记在册。等你和你的同伙以被告的身份出庭之后，诉讼程序就会正式开始……”{n}行政官打量着你，目光宛如毒蛇的凝视。{/n}“准备面对审判吧，{name}。”
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, in accordance with the amendment to Decree 64-98/DF issued by the Adeptus Administratum and the Adeptus Arbites, you stand accused of countless heresies against the sacred tithe and the well-being of the protectorate. All related statements have been formulated and the evidence of your crimes registered — the proceedings will commence as soon as you and your accomplices present yourselves as the accused..." {n}The prefect looks at you with the eyes of a snake.{/n} "A trial awaits you, {name}."

traits.locale_text: “行商浪人{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯，根据帝国内政部与帝国法务部颁布的64-98/DF号法令修正案，你被指控犯下了无数异端恶行。你的所作所为，对神圣什一税与王朝的福祉构成了严重威胁。所有相关供词都已记录在案，你的犯罪证据也已登记在册。等你和你的同伙以被告的身份出庭之后，诉讼程序就会正式开始……”{n}行政官打量着你，目光宛如毒蛇的凝视。{/n}“准备面对审判吧，{name}。”

languages.text: «Comerciante Independiente {name} von Valancius, conforme a la enmienda al decreto 64-98/DF emitida por el Adeptus Administratum y el Adeptus Arbites, se le acusa de incontables herejías contra el sagrado diezmo y el bienestar del protectorado. Las declaraciones relacionadas ya han sido formuladas y las pruebas de sus crímenes, registradas. El proceso empezará en cuanto sus cómplices y usted se presenten como acusados...». {n}La prefecta te lanza una mirada viperina.{/n} «Le espera un juicio, {name}».
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, in accordance with the amendment to Decree 64-98/DF issued by the Adeptus Administratum and the Adeptus Arbites, you stand accused of countless heresies against the sacred tithe and the well-being of the protectorate. All related statements have been formulated and the evidence of your crimes registered — the proceedings will commence as soon as you and your accomplices present yourselves as the accused..." {n}The prefect looks at you with the eyes of a snake.{/n} "A trial awaits you, {name}."

traits.locale_text: «Comerciante Independiente {name} von Valancius, conforme a la enmienda al decreto 64-98/DF emitida por el Adeptus Administratum y el Adeptus Arbites, se le acusa de incontables herejías contra el sagrado diezmo y el bienestar del protectorado. Las declaraciones relacionadas ya han sido formuladas y las pruebas de sus crímenes, registradas. El proceso empezará en cuanto sus cómplices y usted se presenten como acusados...». {n}La prefecta te lanza una mirada viperina.{/n} «Le espera un juicio, {name}».

languages.text: 「ローグトレーダー、{name}フォン・ヴァランシウス、帝国行政局と高等裁定局によって発布された64-98/DF令の修正条項に基づき、あなたは聖なる租税と保護領の福祉を脅かす、数多の異端行為により告発されています。関連する供述書はすべて作成され、罪状の証拠も登録済みです。あなたと共犯者が被告人として出頭し次第、審理は開始されます…」{n}総監は蛇のような目つきであなたを見据える。{/n}「裁判があなたを待っています、{name}」
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, in accordance with the amendment to Decree 64-98/DF issued by the Adeptus Administratum and the Adeptus Arbites, you stand accused of countless heresies that threaten the sacred tithe and the well-being of the protectorate. All related statements have been formulated and evidence of your crimes registered — the proceedings will commence as soon as you and your accomplices present yourselves as the accused..." {n}The prefect looks at you with the eyes of a snake.{/n} "A trial awaits you, {name}."

traits.locale_text: 「ローグトレーダー、{name}フォン・ヴァランシウス、帝国行政局と高等裁定局によって発布された64-98/DF令の修正条項に基づき、あなたは聖なる租税と保護領の福祉を脅かす、数多の異端行為により告発されています。関連する供述書はすべて作成され、罪状の証拠も登録済みです。あなたと共犯者が被告人として出頭し次第、審理は開始されます…」{n}総監は蛇のような目つきであなたを見据える。{/n}「裁判があなたを待っています、{name}」

languages.text: "Hür Tacir {name} von Valancius, Adeptus Administratum ve Adeptus Arbites tarafından yayınlanan 64-98/DF sayılı kararnamede yapılan değişiklik uyarınca, kutsal aşara ve protektoranın refahına karşı sayısız kâfirlikle suçlanıyorsunuz. İlgili tüm beyanlar açık ve kesin bir şekilde ifade edilmiş olup suçlarınıza dair tüm kanıtlar kaydedilmiştir. Siz ve yaltakçılarınız sanık olarak hazır bulunduğunuzda duruşmalar başlayacak..." {n}Prefekt sana bir yılan edasıyla bakıyor.{/n} "Duruşmaya çıkacaksın {name}."
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, in accordance with the amendment to Decree 64-98/DF issued by the Adeptus Administratum and the Adeptus Arbites, you stand accused of countless heresies against the sacred tithe and the well-being of the protectorate. All related statements have been formulated and the evidence of your crimes registered — the proceedings will commence as soon as you and your accomplices present yourselves as the accused..." {n}The prefect looks at you with the eyes of a snake.{/n} "A trial awaits you, {name}."

İlgili tüm beyanlar açık ve kesin bir şekilde ifade edilmiş olup suçlarınıza dair tüm kanıtlar kaydedilmiştir. Siz ve yaltakçılarınız sanık olarak hazır bulunduğunuzda duruşmalar başlayacak..." {n}Prefekt sana bir yılan edasıyla bakıyor.{/n} "Duruşmaya çıkacaksın {name}."
